doc.author: lihongbo
doc.description: 按部门和工单类型统计工单信息

sql.name: hbeoms.depformtypelink
sql.item: select te.c1, te.c700000001, te.c700000003 as 工单编号, te.c700000006 as 建单时间, te.c700000004 as 建单人, te.c700000011 as 主题, te.c700000015 as 紧急程度, te.c700000014 as 所属专业, te.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1} te,{200} g,{100} u where te.C700000005=u.C630000001 and u.C630000015=g.C1 {6} {5}

sql.name: hbeoms.depformtypeselectlink
sql.item: select 't'||ars.SCHEMAID from ARSCHEMA ars,{400} t where ars.name=t.C650000002 {6}
